mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) as "count", cs.attrId as "attrId" FROM clinical_sample cs
GROUP BY cs.attrId UNION SELECT count(*) as "count", cp.attrId as "attrId" FROM clinical_patient cp INNER JOIN sample ON sample.patientStableId = cp.patientIdentifier
